name: ODYSN
description:
Defend the Dyson Sphere!

A hopefully challenging shooter with looping projectile blasts for the Black and White Jam #8 with the theme of LOOP.

Don't shoot yourself in the back, and be sure to repair any damage.

Controls

WASD - Move

SPACE - Jump / Double Jump

LMB - Shoot

Hold R - Repair (while still)

I must confess I had some strange issues when I built this one, where the projectiles ran slower than in the editor. I suspect it is some problem with my code but I unfortunately didn't have time to fix it. All I did was increased the bullet speed so it ran faster when built. I am a bit worried though that the speed is still somehow not frame-rate independent so I hope it is still challenging.

And WebGL builds still seems to hate me at the moment. I will have to see if I can get it sorted.

Game designed in Unity by Circumpunk-KKB
